message: This is a brilliant metaphor.  I hope it spreads.
I <3 his ascii art. it is fantastic.
This is a nice analogy, but eventually I think people will want to know how it *really* (tm) works. At which point you need to explain the stack, pointers, call by value vs call by reference, etc...
This reminds me of CONS boxes from lisp textboxes.
So, does anyone know the presenter of this talk? I was hoping to get a copy of the slideshow if it's possible.

Thanks for the encouraging comments, everyone! @palenous, I will be mixing the slides — which are currently an HTML/jQuery animation — down into a more easily browseable format in the next day or two; I will post here when I can offer a URL.
